overview:
I am a hands-on digital corporate and product marketing executive with expertise developing and managing successful interactive marketing strategies for start-ups in the Internet, e-Commerce and Mobile industries.

My experience is in building and marketing products including those that increase user trust and safety. My in-depth industry knowledge is formed from previous positions held at eBay, Infosys Technologies, TRUSTe, Scient and PayPal having responsibility for protecting more than 110 million consumers and businesses worldwide.

I have created and launched many successful online products and services for both consumers and businesses that have exceeded expectations. I have extensive experience in all of product marketing and product management, ranging from strategic planning, business planning and operations, roadmap definition, user experience design and requirements definition through to global market launch. My past roles include devising and implementing B2B and B2C marketing strategies that generated widespread awareness for product and services in both domestic and international markets for companies ranging in size from start-ups to Fortune 500.
